name: Nagoya University
description: Located in the heart of Japan, Nagoya University is one of the foremost national universities representing Japan. Nagoya University has established its mission as the contribution to the happiness of the people through research and education on humanity, society, and nature. In particular, it aspires to foster the harmonious development of human nature and science, and to conduct highly advanced research and education that overlook the broad sweep of humanities, social and natural sciences.
